sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Button } from '../../interfaces/button'; @Component({ selector: 'buttonComponent', templateUrl: './button.component.html', styleUrls: ['./button.component.scss'] }) export class ButtonComponent implements OnInit { @Input() btn: Button; @Input() disabled: boolean; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { if(!this.disabled){ this.disabled = false;} } callBack = (func: Function, params: Array) => { func(...params.map(param=>param))} }
